Title: Skeleton Story
Credits: Jerry the bone man made this.

Bone-Pit.Body: This is the Bone Pit, a pile of bones. Your fellow bone guys haven't animated yet.

Choices.Text: Lie back down, maybe the other bone guys had it right?

Necromancer-Cave.Body: The necromancer who raised you is busy raising more. She looks annoyed.

Choices.Text: Impress her with your bone dancing

Death.Body: In a blink of an eye, you find yourself in the void once more. Did you die? How? You don't remember.

Fire-Pit.Body: The next room over, a fire pit has a boar roasting on the spit. If you had a mouth, you would salivate.

Ogre.Body:
You feel a massive hand on your shoulder. An ogre picks you up to eye level. 
 "Sorry, nothing personal man. Just how its gotta be." Then, he smashes you into the ground.

Chillin.Body: You are now a pile of bones, lying in the Bone Pit. You feel the pull of magic, but you don't care. You are happy here.
